page.title: 12A LOCAL FACTORY
page.content: nearby River Bela for machinery cooling and cheap land supplied by Dallam Tower Estate.The first product of the factory where working hours were uncertain and conditions were poor inside the factory which employed 100 people was evaporated milk.Machines such as sterilisers and tinning machines were used in the production of the products.This is different to today where conditions are much improved and products have changed over the years.In the winter of 1952 baked beans were canned at the factory followed by the prodution of creamed rice in 1960 and tomato ketchup in 1961,while in 1962 canned juices were introduced.Although many of the above have now ceased to be produced at Libby's there are still numerous products rolling off the production line.These are
